00066 #ifndef INFERENCE_H_
00067 #define INFERENCE_H_
00068 
00069 #include "variablestate.h"
00070 
00076 class Inference
00077 {
00078  public:
00079 
00091   Inference(VariableState* state, long int seed,
00092             const bool& trackClauseTrueCnts)
00093   {
00094     this->state_ = state;
00095     this->seed_ = seed;
00096     if (seed_ <= 0)
00097     {
00098       struct timeval tv;
00099       struct timezone tzp;
00100       gettimeofday(&tv, &tzp);
00101       seed_ = (long int)((( tv.tv_sec & 0177 ) * 1000000) + tv.tv_usec);
00102     }
00103     srandom(seed_);
00104 
00105     trackClauseTrueCnts_ = trackClauseTrueCnts;
00106     if (trackClauseTrueCnts_)
00107     {
00108         // clauseTrueCnts_ will hold the true counts for each first-order clause
00109       clauseTrueCnts_ = new Array<double>;
00110       clauseTrueCnts_->growToSize(state_->getMLN()->getNumClauses(), 0);
00111     }
00112   }
00113   
00117   virtual ~Inference()
00118   {
00119     if (trackClauseTrueCnts_) delete clauseTrueCnts_;
00120   }
00121 
00125   virtual void init() = 0;
00126 
00130   virtual void infer() = 0;
00131 
00135   virtual void printProbabilities(ostream& out) = 0;
00136   
00142   virtual void getPredsWithNonZeroProb(vector<string>& nonZeroPreds,
00143                                        vector<float>& probs) = 0;
00144 
00145   
00149   virtual void printTruePreds(ostream& out) = 0;
00150 
00154   virtual double getProbability(GroundPredicate* const& gndPred) = 0;
00155 
00156   long int getSeed() { return seed_; }
00157   void setSeed(long int s) { seed_ = s; }
00158   
00159   VariableState* getState() { return state_; }
00160   void setState(VariableState* s) { state_ = s; }
00161   
00162   const Array<double>* getClauseTrueCnts() { return clauseTrueCnts_; }
00163 
00164  protected:
00165   
00166     // Seed for randomizer. If not set, then date + time is used
00167   long int seed_;
00168     // State of atoms and clauses used during inference
00169     // Does not belong to inference (do not delete)
00170   VariableState* state_;
00171     // Holds the average number of true groundings of each first-order clause
00172     // in the mln associated with this inference
00173   Array<double>* clauseTrueCnts_;
00174     // Indicates if true counts for each first-order clause are being kept
00175   bool trackClauseTrueCnts_;
00176 };
00177 
00178 #endif /*INFERENCE_H_*/
